7_CLIP_Text_Encode_(Negative_Prompt).title: CLIP Text Encode (Negative Prompt)
values: 色调艳丽，过曝，静态，细节模糊不清，字幕，风格，作品，画作，画面，静止，整体发灰，最差质量，低质量，JPEG压缩残留，丑陋的，残缺的，多余的手指，画得不好的手部，画得不好的脸部，畸形的，毁容的，形态畸形的肢体，手指融合，静止不动的画面，杂乱的背景，三条腿，背景人很多，倒着走

6_CLIP_Text_Encode_(Positive_Prompt).title: CLIP Text Encode (Positive Prompt)
values:
Futuristic fashion runway show in a sleek venue with dramatic blue lighting; models wearing luminescent iridescent jumpsuits in vibrant pink, teal, and purple that pulse and shift colors, all wearing white VR headsets, walking confidently down a glossy illuminated catwalk, photoreal 4K texture, high fashion cinematography.

Beat 1 (0-1.5s): Lead model in glowing pink jumpsuit strides forward with perfect runway posture, her outfit shifting between pink and magenta hues, fabric flowing naturally, VR headset gleaming under stage lights.

Beat 2 (1.5-3s): Camera dollies alongside with smooth tracking as she reaches the runway's end, turns with fluid motion, while second model in teal jumpsuit enters frame from behind, audience silhouettes visible on both sides.

Beat 3 (3-4.2s): Models synchronize their walks back up the runway, jumpsuits continue color-shifting effects, subtle fog drifts across the glossy floor creating atmospheric reflections, professional runway lighting.

Beat 4 (4.2-5s): Camera pulls back to reveal the full catwalk with multiple models, their glowing outfits creating a cascade of shifting light patterns, audience remains attentive in darkened seating.

Camera work: Smooth dolly tracking, professional fashion show cinematography, low-angle hero shots, no crash-zoom, temporal consistency.

photorealistic 4K details, natural color, cinematic lighting, crisp textures, clean edges, no watercolor, fine surface detail, high microcontrast, realistic shading, accurate tone mapping, smooth gradients, realistic highlights, detailed fabric and hair, sharp but natural.

147_Note_147.title: Note_147
values:
Always append the following text after your positive prompt:

photorealistic 4K details, natural color, cinematic lighting, crisp textures, clean edges, no watercolor, temporal consistency, fine surface detail, high microcontrast, realistic shading, accurate tone mapping, smooth gradients, realistic highlights, detailed fabric and hair, sharp but natural.

values:
-Choose your Wan2.2 ti2v 5B  and VAE Models

-Set the steps of your choice (min 8).

-Set the upscaler model of your choice.

164_Note_164.title: Note_164
values:
-Choose your Models here High and Low Noise, Clip  and VAE
-Set the length of your choice.
-Set the resolution in megapixels:
For Low VRAM : 0.21
For High VRAM: 0.50
